# Example

## preprocess data

```{r eval = F}
beds <- preprocess_bed(
  files = c(
    system.file("extdata", "enhancer.bed", package="hawkes_genomics"),
    system.file("extdata", "coding_prom.bed", package="hawkes_genomics"),
    system.file("extdata", "sin3peaks.bed", package="hawkes_genomics")
  ),
  names = c("enhancer", "prom", "sin3"),
)
beds
```

## hawkes computation

```{r eval = F}
res <- compute_hawkes_histogram(
  files = beds$preprocess_beds,
  names = beds$names
)
```

## plot data

```{r eval = F}
plot_convolution(res, width = beds$interval_size)
```
